translations: 不顾，不加理会；不管怎样，无论如何

sentences.sentence: She always travels first-class regardless of expense.
sentences.translation: 无论费用多高她总是乘头等舱。

sentences.sentence: Despite her recent surgery she has been carrying on regardless.
sentences.translation: 尽管她最近动了手术，她却一直在不顾一切地继续工作。

sentences.sentence: The club welcomes all new members regardless of age.
sentences.translation: 俱乐部对所有新成员不分年龄一律欢迎。
